Entries.default: In the distance, you spy a mine set into the side of a hill, its entrance just barely peeking out from between the trees.
As you near the mine, a loud explosion rocks the ground. A flurry of terrified birds burst from nearby trees, and a massive cloud of dust rockets out of the cave mouth.
The entrance to the mine is littered with dust and shattered stone from the earlier explosion. You walk carefully to avoid turning an ankle on the rubble.
